snippet: A historic building on the waterfront in Providence, R.I., that used to house a power plant was going to be the site of a new hotel and museum, but then the recession hit.
abstract: Interest is once again rising for $150 million project to convert historic power plant on the waterfront in Providence, RI, into luxury hotel and museum associated with Smithsonian Institution; conversion plans were derailed by recession.
lead_paragraph: A historic building on the waterfront in Providence, R.I., that used to house a power plant was going to be the site of a new hotel and museum, but then the recession hit.

headline.seo: New Revival Plans for Historic Providence, R.I., Power Plant
headline.main: Historic Power Plant in Providence, R.I., May Get Another Chance at an Encore
headline.print_headline: Historic Power Plant in Providence, R.I., May Get Another Chance at an Encore
